name: Color Painting - Happy Color
description:
Color Painting - Happy Color is EASY, FUN, RELAXING and ADDICTIVE!

Paint Color by Number is a free coloring game and coloring app. Coloring modern artworks with paint by number and color by number. It’s the most relaxing and funny coloring game designed for all ages. All categories and pages of art pieces are all free! Dozens of trending artworks will be updated every day! Everyday is a fresh start with Color Painting!

Color Painting is an innovative color by number game with diversified and modern artworks. Use your creative mind to build your own gallery. Enjoy the countless color by number coloring pages! Different from the traditional coloring book app, Color Painting only needs to choose the numbers and fill in the blank area. Color painting is popular among peoples!There is a great variety of themes that you can choose: unicorn coloring pages, dragon coloring pages, dog coloring pages, mandala coloring pages, cat coloring pages, horse coloring pages, bird coloring pages, delicious foods coloring pages, mermaid coloring pages, Nature coloring pages, Scenery coloring pages, Beauty coloring pages, Architecture coloring pages, Fashion, Lifestyle coloring pages, Cute babe pages and many more.

HOW TO PAINT:
- Choose different numbers to locate the unfinished coloring cells.
- Use 2 fingers to zoom-in or zoom-out through the coloring image.
- Use 1 finger to drag the coloring image from one place to another.
- “Hints” help you auto-locate the coloring cells which you cannot find.
- Your artworks’ progress will be auto-saved when you leave or close it.

Key Features
- Start coloring ANYTIME & ANYWHERE: no pencil, paper or other tools needed
- Various themes for all tastes: animals, Scenery, People, Architecture, Lifestyle and many more
- There are hints if you get sucked in finding the areas that is marked numbers.
- Reward: Daily reward pics and many kinds of reward are waiting for you
- Quick Sharing: show your excellent painting artworks with your friends
